posts.post_title: FS: The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Company  AKA the OJ Bible SOLD
posts.post_content:
This great collectors tool has a few rough spots on the dust jacket.  The book itself is in mint condition.  

$50 shipped. PP F/F preferred, other ok.

Thanks for looking and have a great day!

Best,

Andy
